title: Following Regulations are applicable for Development / Redevelopment of building falling within Nagp
clause_text: Following Regulations are applicable for Development / Redevelopment of building falling within Nagpur Metro Rail Corridor (NMRC)
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.
